.. _`officelink-relnotes-whatsnew`:

What's New
##########

-   15.5.0.0

    -   New |tm.project| interface

        A new interface between CONTACT's project management and |tm.project| has been developed,
        mainly based on the XML format of |tm.project|. From now on the old |tm.project| interface
        shipped until cs.officelink 15.3 is no longer supported. For further information please
        see the manuals of :emphasis:`Projects` and :emphasis:`OfficeLink`.

    -   Server-side and thus customizable evaluation of document variables via the modes *rs*, *ws*
        and *rws*.
